Verses.18: But if you are led by the Spirit, you are not under the Law.
Verses.19: Now, the works of the flesh are obvious. They include sexual immorality, impurity, indecent behavior,
Verses.20: idolatry, witchcraft, hostilities, discord, jealousy, outbursts of anger, selfish ambition, dissensions, factions,
Verses.21: envy, drunkenness, carousing, and things like these. I warn you, like I did before, that those who practice such things will not inherit the kingdom of God.
Verses.22: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,
Verses.23: gentleness, and self-control. For there is no law against such things.
Verses.24: Those who belong to Christ Jesus have now crucified the flesh with its passions and desires.
Verses.25: If we live by the Spirit, let us keep in step with the Spirit. 26) Let us not become boastful, provoking, and envying one another.

Changes: 2024-01-06 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 18-25 based on Greek.
